amendment.description: To provide a savings provision for certain transfer of functions under the Homeland Security Act of 2002.

vote.text: Amendment SA 113 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 113 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kohl. (consideration: CR S1405-1406; text: CR S1405-1406) To provide a savings provision for certain transfer of functions under the Homeland Security Act of 2002.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 113 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 113 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kohl.
